Package it.ma.polimi.briscola

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Briscola2PAITournament
    Class thought to check if the AIs behave properly, and to determine what is the best AI
    Briscola2PFullMatchConfigTest
    Class that contains Birscola2PMatchConfig tests.
    Briscola2PHandTest
    Class for test of Briscola2PHand.
    Briscola2PMatchNoGUIControllerTest
    Class containing tests of the Briscola2PMatchNoGUIController.
    Briscola2PMatchRecordTest
    Test class containing test for Briscola2PMatchRecord
    Briscola2PPileTest
    Class for test of Briscola2PPile.
    Briscola2PSurfaceTest
    Test class containing tests for Briscola2PSurface.
    BriscolaApplication
    Class extending Application, mainly used to manage the SoundService and to detect when the app goes to background
    BuildConfig  
    EnumsTest
    Test class collecting tests for the enums with non-ordinary methods.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumentation test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ImageMetadata
    Class that performs a mapping between the assets names and the model names of the cards, also provides methods to retrieve resources IDs
    MoveTest
    Class created appositely for the Prof. evaluation.
    NeapolitanCardTest
    Tests for NeapolitanCard.
    NeapolitanDeckTest
    Tests for NeapolitanDeckTest, implicitly tests all AbstractDeck methods and all the AbstractCardListWrapper methods (they won't be tested again exhaustively in other classes)
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.animator  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.mipmap  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    TestSuit
    Class that, if run, performs all the tests produced for the delivery.
